article_title: Whom Should You Use For Help In A Tax Case?

article_metadata.author: Stephen J. Dunn

og.description: “Tax Resolution” Firms I have repeatedly posted on the perils of “tax resolution” firms.  These operators are nominally attorneys, CPAs, or Enrolled Agents.  Their business consists of inducing taxpayers suffering imminent or actual tax collection action to pay large retainers—$5,000 or more—for promised relief from the tax collection action.  Once the [...]
